title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity’s survival. The journey tests their courage and understanding of physics.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief enters people’s dreams to steal secrets and plant ideas. Reality and imagination blur in a high-stakes heist.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos in Gotham. The battle challenges morality, justice, and order.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the world is a simulated reality controlled by machines. He joins a rebellion to free humanity.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of Facebook’s creation, exploring ambition, friendship, and legal battles. It highlights the rise of social media.

title: The Imitation Game
description: Alan Turing works to crack the Nazi Enigma code during WWII. His intelligence and struggles shape the course of history.

title: Gravity
description: Two astronauts struggle to survive after their shuttle is destroyed in space. They rely on ingenuity and teamwork to return home.

title: Her
description: A lonely writer falls in love with an intelligent operating system. The story explores love, consciousness, and technology.

title: The Martian
description: An astronaut stranded on Mars uses science and creativity to survive. He must communicate with Earth to get rescued.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist attempts to communicate with aliens who have landed on Earth. Understanding their language may save humanity.

title: Avatar
description: Humans colonize Pandora to mine resources. A marine becomes torn between his mission and the planet’s indigenous people.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against an emperor. His journey combines honor, family, and vengeance.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple falls in love aboard the doomed RMS Titanic. Their romance faces societal class and tragedy.

title: Jurassic Park
description: Scientists clone dinosaurs for a theme park. Chaos ensues when the creatures escape their enclosures.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers attempt to undo Thanos’ destruction. They face emotional and physical challenges to save the universe.

title: Black Panther
description: The king of Wakanda defends his nation against internal and external threats. Tradition, technology, and responsibility collide.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of intergalactic misfits must stop a powerful villain. Their teamwork, humor, and courage save the galaxy.

title: Iron Man
description: A billionaire engineer builds a powerful suit to fight evil. He discovers responsibility and heroism along the way.

title: Doctor Strange
description: A surgeon discovers magic after a tragic accident. He learns mystical arts to defend the world from supernatural threats.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
description: Peter Parker balances high school life with being a superhero. He faces challenges from villains and his own insecurities.

title: Wonder Woman
description: An Amazonian warrior leaves her island to stop a world war. She learns about humanity, justice, and love.

title: Man of Steel
description: Clark Kent discovers his alien origins and destiny. He becomes Superman to protect Earth from threats.

title: Batman Begins
description: Bruce Wayne trains to fight crime after witnessing his parents’ death. He faces his fears and forms his alter ego, Batman.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring
description: A hobbit embarks on a quest to destroy a powerful ring. Friendship and bravery guide the fellowship’s journey.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Two Towers
description: The fellowship is scattered, and war looms. Courage and hope drive their struggle against evil forces.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Return of the King
description: The final battle against Sauron begins. Sacrifice and heroism determine the fate of Middle-earth.

title: Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
description: Bilbo Baggins joins dwarves on a quest to reclaim their homeland. Adventure and courage lead him into danger.

title: Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
description: Bilbo confronts the dragon Smaug. He grows in bravery and resourcefulness on his journey.

title: Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
description: Allies unite for a massive battle. Strategy, loyalty, and sacrifice determine the outcome of war.

title: Star Wars: A New Hope
description: Luke Skywalker begins his journey as a Jedi. He helps the Rebellion fight the Empire and learns about destiny.

title: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
description: The Empire pursues the Rebellion relentlessly. Luke trains with Yoda while confronting personal challenges.

title: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi
description: The final confrontation with the Empire occurs. Luke and his friends fight to restore peace to the galaxy.

title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
description: A new hero emerges while the First Order rises. Old legends return to guide the next generation.

title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
description: Rebellion forces struggle against the First Order. Characters face moral dilemmas and personal growth challenges.

title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
description: The final battle against the dark side unfolds. Heroes confront legacy, destiny, and the future of the galaxy.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers face Thanos, who seeks all Infinity Stones. Stakes are high as heroes unite and struggle to survive.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
description: Thor must prevent the destruction of Asgard. Humor, courage, and teamwork shape the battle against Hela.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
description: The guardians explore family, friendship, and cosmic threats. Their adventures deepen character bonds.

title: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff confronts her past. Espionage, family, and heroism intertwine in her journey.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
description: Shang-Chi faces his father’s criminal empire. Martial arts, destiny, and identity are central themes.

title: Captain Marvel
description: Carol Danvers discovers her powers and identity. She battles intergalactic threats and learns self-confidence.

title: Ant-Man
description: A thief gains shrinking abilities. He learns to use them for heroic purposes with humor and ingenuity.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
description: Scott and Hope team up for a new mission. Their partnership balances action, science, and humor.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange confronts chaos across the multiverse. Mysticism and ethical dilemmas challenge him.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: Peter Parker travels abroad while facing new threats. Responsibility and friendship guide his actions.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter confronts the consequences of his secret identity being revealed. Multiverse challenges test his limits.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth’s mightiest heroes unite against Loki. Teamwork, strategy, and heroism save the world.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
description: The Avengers face Ultron, a rogue AI. They must work together to prevent global catastrophe.

title: Doctor Strange: Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange faces threats across multiple realities. Magic, responsibility, and choices drive the story.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: The guardians face cosmic challenges and personal growth. Humor, courage, and loyalty prevail.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees after his father’s death. He learns responsibility, bravery, and leadership.

title: Aladdin
description: A street-smart youth discovers a magical lamp. He learns love, courage, and self-confidence through adventure.

title: Beauty and the Beast
description: A young woman bonds with a cursed prince. Love and acceptance transform their worlds.

title: Frozen
description: Two sisters navigate love, fear, and family responsibilities. Magic and self-discovery guide their journey.

title: Tangled
description: A princess with magical hair escapes captivity. Adventure, friendship, and love shape her story.

title: Moana
description: A young girl sails to save her island. Courage, self-discovery, and environmental respect drive her adventure.

title: Coco
description: A boy explores the Land of the Dead to discover family history. Music, tradition, and courage intertwine.

title: Inside Out
description: A young girl’s emotions guide her actions. Self-awareness and emotional intelligence are central themes.

title: Up
description: An elderly man and a boy embark on a flying adventure. Friendship, loss, and adventure shape their journey.

title: WALL-E
description: A robot cleans a deserted Earth while seeking love and purpose. Environmental and emotional themes emerge.

title: Toy Story
description: Toys come to life when humans aren’t around. Friendship, loyalty, and imagination are highlighted.

title: Toy Story 2
description: The toys face new threats and adventures. Courage and teamwork are central to the story.

title: Toy Story 3
description: The toys face uncertainty as their owner grows up. Themes of loyalty, change, and love are explored.

title: Toy Story 4
description: The toys embark on a journey to help a new friend. Growth, friendship, and purpose are highlighted.

title: Finding Nemo
description: A clownfish searches for his lost son. Adventure, perseverance, and family bonds are central.

title: Finding Dory
description: Dory searches for her family with help from friends. Memory, courage, and belonging are explored.

title: Shrek
description: An ogre rescues a princess in an unexpected adventure. Humor, love, and self-acceptance are themes.

title: Shrek 2
description: Shrek continues adventures with friends and family. Themes of identity, love, and humor persist.

title: Shrek the Third
description: Shrek faces responsibilities as a future king. Friendship, courage, and family guide his choices.

title: Shrek Forever After
description: Shrek navigates an alternate reality. Lessons about love, family, and self-discovery are emphasized.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
description: A young wizard begins magical education. Friendship, courage, and destiny unfold.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: Mystery and danger arise at Hogwarts. Friendship and bravery guide Harry’s actions.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
description: Harry faces new threats and learns more about magic. Loyalty, growth, and courage are central.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
description: Harry competes in a magical tournament. Strategy, friendship, and bravery are key themes.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: Harry faces an oppressive regime. Leadership, friendship, and resilience are emphasized.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
description: Secrets and romance challenge Harry and friends. Courage and strategy are central.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
description: Harry, Hermione, and Ron go on a dangerous quest. Sacrifice and friendship drive the story.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
description: The final battle against Voldemort occurs. Destiny, courage, and victory are highlighted.

title: The Hunger Games
description: Katniss volunteers in place of her sister. Survival, rebellion, and courage define her journey.

title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
description: Katniss navigates a dangerous new arena. Rebellion and strategy shape her actions.

title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 1
description: Katniss leads a rebellion against oppressive rulers. Strategy, leadership, and hope are key.

title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 2
description: The final conflict concludes. Sacrifice, courage, and change are central.

title: Divergent
description: Tris discovers her identity in a divided society. Choices, courage, and love define her journey.

title: Insurgent
description: Tris challenges authority and faces personal trials. Strategy, love, and courage continue.

title: Allegiant
description: Tris explores secrets of her world beyond the city. Identity, rebellion, and discovery are central.

title: The Maze Runner
description: Teenagers navigate a deadly maze. Survival, teamwork, and discovery define their journey.

title: The Scorch Trials
description: The maze survivors face a dangerous landscape. Courage, strategy, and friendship are tested.

title: The Death Cure
description: The final battle to escape the WCKD organization unfolds. Sacrifice, loyalty, and perseverance prevail.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
description: Two teenagers with illness fall in love. Life, love, and mortality are explored.

title: Me Before You
description: A young woman forms a bond with a paralyzed man. Love, personal growth, and difficult choices are highlighted.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Elizabeth Bennet navigates society and love. Pride, misunderstanding, and romance drive the story.

title: Emma
description: A young woman tries to play matchmaker. Growth, love, and self-awareness are central.

title: Sense and Sensibility
description: Two sisters navigate love and family obligations. Society, emotion, and choice are explored.

title: Little Women
description: Four sisters grow up together, facing love, loss, and ambition. Family and personal growth are central.

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: A boy in WWII discovers humanity and compassion. Humor and tragedy combine to tell the story.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A concierge and lobby boy navigate adventure, theft, and intrigue. Humor and friendship are key themes.

title: The Royal Tenenbaums
description: An eccentric family deals with love, loss, and reconciliation. Comedy and emotion intertwine.

title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
description: A clever fox outsmarts farmers to protect family and friends. Humor, strategy, and family are emphasized.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: A laid-back man gets entangled in a kidnapping plot. Humor, confusion, and character interactions are central.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: Allied soldiers plan revenge against Nazis. Strategy, courage, and unexpected outcomes define the story.
